tool_description:
An API service returning news articles about pollution in african countries.
Try using another project of mine to summarize the articles - 
https://soft-summarizer.vercel.app/
name: pollution-news-api
title: pollution-news-api

api_list.name: Get news from a specific source
api_list.description: This Endpoint would return news on pollution in african countries from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pollution-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/News/sei"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pollution-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pollution-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/News/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pollution-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News on Pollution
api_list.description: This endpoint would return all news on pollution in african countries available in our database.
